Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Congenital Abnormalities/Abnormalities, Multiple/Prolidase Deficiency
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Rare autosomal recessive disorder of metabolism due to mutations in the prolidase gene. It is characterized by recurrent lower extremity skin ulcers, recurrent infections, and FACIES, often with mental retardation.
